creditline: Gift of Willard and Elizabeth Clark
description: a white egret preens itself while perched on a scraggly tree trunk that arches over water; delicate gold branches with sparse leaves dangle and jut out around the bird; red berries punctuate the lower right half of the image with bright color
markings: Red, square stamp below signature in LRC
signed: Japanese characters in black ink LRC
title: Egret
